m_szDocTitle: The Strati: a 3D-printed electric car that could be built in 24 hours | Technology | The Guardian
m_szDocSumamry: 20 innovations for 2015 The Strati: a 3D-printed electric car that could be built in 24 hours Eventually 3D-printed cars could be designed with their local environment in mind, such as extreme cold weather or the desert Tuesday 9 December 2014 05.00 EST Last modified on Tuesday 9 December 2014 08.51 EST Share on WhatsApp When Jay Rogers drove away from the International Manufacturing Technology Show in September and toured around Chicago in a two-seater, you could be forgiven for not paying much attention. Unless, of course, you’d watched it rise up out of a 3D printer the size of a shipping c
